ogering Pegleg was a drow from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Rogering Pegleg was a man with long white hair who wore light armor.
In the , a large group of duergar, giant spiders, and drow, was slaughtered in the home of a Bloomridge Park groundskeeper, Lavernica. The murder spree was performed by Orin the Red and her Murder Tribunal of Bhaal. Rogering Peglegs slaughtered body was found in a cellar underneath Lavernicas home, near a butchered drow woman, a grotesque display â€“ an effigy representing Sendai, a drow Bhaalspawn who died a century earlier.
